text: @narendramodi @RBI Very effective step taken by RBI! May I request you to think over providing some kind of discount of around 0.5% or otherwise on noncash transactions on payment through BHIM or other UPI apps to ensure a check on spread of COVID-19 by uses of currency notes and coins.
